author: Staff Reporter
text:
A three-day national sea sports event, ‘Manapad Classic -2016’ concluded on Sunday evening. During the three-day schedule, events such as sailing, surfing, kite-boarding, kayaking, wind surfing and stand-up-paddle events were organized.

Scores of sportspersons displayed their talents in the shallow waters of Manapad coast.

At the valedictory function in Manapad, Collector M. Ravikumar gave away prizes to winners in all events in the presence of Tuticorin Sub-Collector, S. Gopala Sundara Raj and Tiruchendur Revenue Divisional Officer, Thyagarajan.

In kayaking event, Coastal Security Group commandos secured the top three positions, Deputy Superintendent of Police, CSG, N.K. Stanley Jones, who took part in the valedictory function, said.
title: Sea sports event concludes at Manapad
